requestBody.title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "HIPAA-compliant everything". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Agent-specific rate limits (different from human users)". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
